shifts.title: Ohana House Fairy
shifts.description: This is a 4 hours shift to oversee Ohana House, which is our Accessible, sober, kids friendly space. There will be fun events, art and crafts, improv, costuming, etc. You are responsible for making sure the space is relatively orderly, safe and fun. You will also be the point of contact for kids on site.

shifts.title: Parent Liaison
shifts.description:
This shift is 4 hours.  This person is the primary contact between NORG and our lovely parents:)  For e.g. answering their questions, directing them to resources.
Make the Meet n Greet fun and debrief parents on basic information.  
Keep an updated list of children/parents attending.
